XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="DMLSS.NewProduction" LogGeneralTraceEvents="true"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="FileService" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.File.PassthroughService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">/srv/hs/db/data/dmlss</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FileSpec">testFile???.txt</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigNames">EmailOperation</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="EmailOperation" Category="" ClassName="DMLSS.EmailPassthroughOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="From">dmlss@va.gov</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Recipient">Oliver.Wilms@va.gov</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="SMTPPort">25</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="SMTPServer">smtp.va.gov</Setting> </Item> </Production>
